name: Production Showcase: World of the Tiny Folks
name_original: Production Showcase: World of the Tiny Folks
description:
Production phase showcase demo:

A little target challenge to showcase the updates on the game. The full game will be a real metroidvania, I swear!

We don't expect to release a full game at the end of the final sprint, our goal has changed to releasing a short demo containing 1-2 areas. If you like the game so far, please play the final demo and stay tuned after the jam has ended!

Controls:

Keyboard Controller Action AA Jump SB / XSword Space    R2 Dash Down + SpaceDown + R2   Slide EL Bomb WR Bow DL2 Grab/Throw

Jump on walls to perform a walljump.

Use the grab button + up/down on walls to climb.

Dashing off the ground and climbing uses stamina.

You can pick up and throw bombs.

Press up/down while pressing the bow button to aim.

Game design, programming, pixel art, mood: www.twitter.com/pinselschubser

Concept art, pixel art: www.twitter.com/pigeon_dusty 

Concept art: www.instagram.com/joppiejaust/
